data.title: Messy Sentence
data.statement: Find the pattern and solve it.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: us Brad with Came dinner To
testCases.testOut: Brad came to dinner with us

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: house My new Father a Bought
testCases.testOut: My father bought a new house

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: There understand to Is much So
testCases.testOut: There is so much to understand

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: I moment Have the No at Money
testCases.testOut: I have no money at the moment

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: chocolates of box a like is life
testCases.testOut: Life is like a box of chocolates

data.outputDescription: a string for the reordered sentence

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Find the pattern and solve it.
Input
original string s
Output
a string for the reordered sentence
Constraints
0 < length of s <= 1024
Example
Input
I car a have
Output
I have a car
